items.title: Haiti gang warfare stalls long-awaited elections
items.summary: (Reuters) -Haiti will not hold a general election before the end of the current interim government's mandate next February, the head of the country's electoral council told Reuters on Wednesday, as the expansion of armed gangs makes any hope for a full and stable vote impossible. Today’s deal shaves $14 off its usual going rate, marking the return of the lowest price it first hit during the fall Prime Day sale earlier this month. We’ve seen the standard grey variant go for less at $76, and the newly launched black one is now within $4 of that price.
